Support Frequently Asked Questions Get more help Useful tips and answers About Who are we? How do I upload files to the cloud file manager? Is there a size limit for the files I can upload? Backing up photos and videos Change the way the files are sorted Report a problem Contact with us Gaen Privacy Statement Software License What is GAEN? About us Back First step On the screen tap the Files section Second step Touch the button with the + symbol Third step You will see two options, the first one to add a file and the second one to add a folder, choose the first one and you will be able to upload your file. At Gaen, we understand that different users have different needs in terms of storage and file management. Therefore, we offer various rates to suit a wide range of needs, from individual users to large companies, so the only two limits are: 1.Contracted tariff since you will have more gigabatios the better it is. Remaining space of the tariff, if you have already occupied memory, you will not be able to occupy it. Then, as shown in the image, go to the permissions section and confirm that you have the option to add the files to the cloud. Backing up photos and videos Backing up your photos and videos is essential for several reasons that have to do with the protection, accessibility and long-term preservation of your memories and important information, so we will explain in a simple way how to do it: Add your files to the manager Changing the way files are sorted We understand that for people who use our file manager professionally to manage multiple folders and files can be tedious, for that reason there is the option to organize files and folders according to basic standards such as time or the alphabet in this way to achieve a better order of the same and following these steps you will know how to do it: As a first step we will only have to go to the files section. As a second step you should just tap on the A-Z order button and this dropdown will be displayed: Report a problem State the problem: Submit problem Any questions or problems can be answered by an assistant via email or phone call: Contact with us GAEN Privacy Statement Effective Date: [09/23/2029]. 1. Information we collect Data provided by you: Account and Registration Information: When you create an account with Gaen, we collect your name, email address and password. Files and Content: We collect and store the files you upload, download or access through our service, including photos, videos and documents. 2. Use of information To provide, maintain and improve our services. Protect the security of our services and our users. Communicate with you, including sending you information about changes to our terms or policies. 3. Information security We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, loss or destruction. 1. Grant of License: Gaen grants the user a non-exclusive, non-transferable, limited license to use the software solely for personal or internal commercial use. 2. Restrictions: The user must not modify, redistribute, decompile, or create derivative works of the software. It is also prohibited to sublicense or use the software for commercial hosting services. 3. Ownership: The software is the exclusive property of Gaen and is protected by copyright laws and international treaties. The user does not acquire any ownership rights in the software. Warranty: The software is provided \"as is\" without warranty of any kind, either expressed or implied. 5. Limitation of Liability: Gaen shall not be liable for indirect, incidental or consequential damages arising out of the use of the software. 6. Termination: The license shall be valid until terminated, which may occur if the user breaches the stated terms. Upon termination, all copies of the software must be destroyed. 7. Entire Agreement: This license represents the entire agreement between the user and Gaen regarding the use of the software. What is GAEN? Gaen is a cloud file management service designed to provide users with secure, accessible and easy-to-use storage. Gaen Main Features: Cloud Storage: Users can upload their files to secure servers in the cloud, where they are protected and accessible from anywhere. Variety of permissions: The permissions make that according to the options that you select the manager will act in a different way and totally to the taste of the consumer. Security and Privacy: The service uses advanced encryption to protect data during transmission and at rest, ensuring that users\' personal and business information is kept private and secure. Benefits of Using GAEN: Flexibility: Access your files from any device, anytime, anywhere. Scalability: Offers different storage plans tailored to individual or business needs, allowing you to increase storage space as needed. Founded in 2024 by a trio of technology innovators - José Gallardo, José Javier and José María - Gaen was born out of the need to create a secure, intuitive and accessible platform for digital records management. With years of experience in information technology and software development, our team set out to design a tool that would not only facilitate records management, but also transform the way teams collaborate and access their information. Our Mission: At Gaen, our mission is to simplify the lives of our users by offering a cloud storage solution that is secure, easy to use and fully accessible from anywhere in the world. We are committed to protecting the privacy of our users and guarantee that all data stored on our platform is protected with the highest security standards. Our Commitment: We are dedicated to continuous improvement and are always listening to the needs of our users to adapt and improve our features. We value feedback and are committed to constant innovation to continue to offer one of the best file management experiences on the market. Thanks for trusting us! GAEN Support">
